xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Elastic Search Macros and Samples
xwikidoc.content:
This package contains some code and macros to help integrate Elastic Search data into XWiki.
* [[QueryMacro]]: elastic search macro * [[Kibana4Macro]]: kibana macro to display a kibana4 widget * [[Samples]]: sample pages with macros and code examples * [[Groovy]]: groovy code to interact with an elastic search engine
